channel.title: Syntax on Pen programming language
channel.description: Recent content in Syntax on Pen programming language

item.title: Block
item.description: Block Background () Given a file named “pen.json” with: { "dependencies": {} } Define a variable Given a file named “Foo.pen” with: f = \(x number) number { y = x y } When I run pen build Then the exit status should be 0. Call a function Given a file named “Foo.pen” with: f = \() none { none } g = \() none { f() none } When I run pen build
